transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ha madam.
Executive: Hello. Ghaziabad se baat kar rahe hain na sir?
Customer: Ha ha Rajendra bhai se baat kar raha hu madam.
Executive: Hanji sir, main aapke account manager baat kar rahi hu madam.
Hello.
Customer: Hello. Ha boliye bataiye madam.
Executive: Ha meri ye main ye puch rahi thi jaise maine aapko catalog ka bataya tha aapne bola tha theek hai change karni hai. Maine aapko call kara tha aapse kal bhi mera connect nahi ho paya parso bhi nahi ho paya tha.
Customer: A kal market me tha na isliye aapko phone pe baat nahi hui kal alag gaya tha aaj free hu aaj lunch ke baad kar sakte hai madam.
Executive: Kitne baje lunch ke baad connect karu?
Customer: 3 baje 3 baje connect karte hai ko aaj kahi nahi jane wala aaj free hu.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai main aapko 3 baje connect karti hu.
Customer: Ha ha theek hai 3 baje mai aapko call me wait karo wait karta hu madam.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Baki sir ye puchna tha mere ko jaise abhi ye jo buyleads vagera aa rahe hai wo kaise aa rahe hai?
Customer: Abhi wo buyleads khatam ho gayi madam wo sab.
Executive: Consume kar li aapne?
Customer: Ha sab khatam ho gayi abhi wo Monday se aayegi nahi.
Executive: Sab khatam ho gayi ek minute main check kar leti hu.
Executive: Ab relevant aa rahi hai buyleads jaisi aapko chahiye proper?
Customer: A maine aapko bataya ki wo compressor ki jyada aa rahi hai abhi.
Executive: Hanji hanji. To uske liye to aisa hai ki category vagera agar hum change karenge na to wo aane lag jayenge theek. Baki conversion vagera aaya?
Customer: Conversion aaya baat baat hui kisi se?
Customer: Ha baat hui thi ek do bhai se usko abhi purana maal hai na wo nahi chahiye wo unko abhi 2025 ka chahiye. Us vishay me abhi baat kar rahi hai abhi bhai se.
Executive: Achha achha matlab abhi baat chal rahi hai aapki.
Customer: Ha baat chal rahi hai abhi.
Executive: September October September se chal raha hai na abhi tak abhi tak koi bhi business vagera aapko mila to hoga ya buyleads vagera badhiya achi khasi consume kar rahe ho.
Customer: A abhi sabko mehnga lagta hai kisi ko jo chahiye wo hota nahi aisa sab kuch hota hai madam abhi.
Executive: Ha ye to hai hai. To jaise aapne sari buylead consume kar li hai to in sab se baat baat kar li aapne ki matlab jaise abhi aapki baat to ki hai maine sabse baat kari raha wo bhi aur buylead abhi nahi hai to abhi wo Monday se buylead aayegi na to aap mere ko kaise buylead use karna hai wo mere ko ek baar bata dijiye kyuki 17 buylead aati hai na maine sirf 10 consume ki hai abhi 10 buylead li.
Executive: Saat baki hai.
Customer: Sari khatam ho gayi abhi to.
Executive: Nahi nahi saat buyleads abhi baki hai.
Customer: Baki hai abhi?
Executive: Saat baki hai abhi bhi aapki.
Customer: A to kal maine do buyleads wo aayi thi na to maine us pe click kiya to aayi nahi buylead abhi wo.
Executive: Achha achha to abhi aapki jo saat baki hai na jaise ek bhi buylead aapne kal consume kari hai Abhishek Maurya ki kari hai na?
Customer: Abhishek kal kal kari thi aapne. Nahi nahi kal kal nahi ki buylead ek bhi.
Executive: Ye kal ki hi hai sir jo aapne consume kari hai.
Customer: Achha dekh leta hu madam abhi dekh leta hu aur connect karte samay aapko dekh leta hu. Ha ek baar isko check kariyega aur aapne 10 tarikh ko matlab ye laga lo che saat buylead consume kari thi to us din relevant aa rahi thi kya?
Customer: Ha theek hai us din ka khatam ho gaya buylead.
Executive: Nahi nahi jaise 10 tarikh ko aapne saat buylead consume kari thi theek hai. To 10 din ko saat buylead aapne consume kari thi to baat kari thi sabse?
Customer: Ha baat chalu hai sabse wo.
Executive: Sabse baat chalu hai?
Customer: Ha baat chalu hai abhi whatsapp me abhi do teen ka abhi message nahi aaya abhi wo call kiya tha receive nahi kiya tha usko.
Executive: Achha to jaise unse baat baat hui to unhone kya bola ki wo log lenge kharidenge?
Customer: Ha kharidenge ek ek kharidenge do din ke baad kharidenge aisa bola tha.
Executive: Achha achha do din ke baad karenge wo aisa bola unhone. To ek ko 2025 ka model chahiye wo bhi ek se baat hui thi.
Executive: To jaise ye buylead abhi aa rakhi hai 33 minute pehle aayi hai high pressure breathing air compressor se to deal karoge aap isme?
Customer: Ha to compressor me kam deal karta hu cylinder aur set me jyada deal karta hu wo bhi dekh leta hu mai.
Executive: Aayi hui hai.
Customer: Ha aati hai to mai dekh hi leta hu.
Executive: Is wale ko ek baar dekh lijiye waise to isse matlab ek piece me hi hai isse achha to aap business use wali kar sakte hai air compressor me karenge?
Customer: Wo usme kya hota hai ki compressor me buylead le leta hu to samne wale ko price jyada lagti hai kyuki 90000 hote hai to usko sahi price nahi lagti wo usse aisa hota hai matlab compressor me kam deal karta hu leta hu buylead compressor ki par jyada wo cylinder ki aati hai na to wo jyada leta hu set ki.
Executive: Cylinder ka matlab jo pura set hota hai wo wali?
Customer: Ha pura set wala sirf cylinder wala dono leta hu bhi jyada.
Executive: Achha achha ek second main aapki buyleads ka wo check karti hu ki kitni buyleads matlab aa rahi hai aapke pass jaise abhi.
Customer: Abhi connect kar lijiye madam 3 baje connect kar lete hai na baad me check karte hai samne se aapko pata chal jayega. Theek hai.
Executive: Ek kam karti hu main 3 baje aapko video meet pe leti hu theek hai. Ha ha 3 baje connect kar lete hai dekh lete hai sab buylead aati hai kya wo jyada aati hai wo kam aati hai.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai.
Customer: Ok mai aapko 3 baje message ya call back karta hu madam.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai thank you. Okay okay madam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to know how to use buyleads.

- Customer says compressor buyleads are expensive.

- Customer says buyleads are not showing after clicking.



Resolution:

- Executive said she will connect at 3 PM.

- Executive said she will take customer on video meet.

- Executive informed about pending 7 buyleads.

- Executive suggested changing category for relevant buyleads.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect with customer at 3 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, catalog, follow up
